channel.title: aDNA simulators on open-archaeo
channel.description: Recent content in aDNA simulators on open-archaeo

item.title: adrsm
item.description: A tool designed to simulate the paired-end sequencing of a metagenomic community.

item.title: gargammel
item.description: A set of programs aimed at simulating ancient DNA fragments. For ancient hominin samples our program can also simulate various levels of present-day human contamination and microbial contamination.

item.title: tapas
item.description: Evaluate the effectiveness of any short read mapper and its parameters using artificially generated reads.
